resources.string: Please enter your reference id for downloading the certificate
Invalid reference id. Please enter a valid reference id
Certificate Downloaded and saved on your phone.
We respect your privacy and safety. We do not save or share any sensitive information of user.
- All data is fetched from CoWin portal.\n- D1, D2 represents available capacity for dose 1 and dose 2 respectively.\n- Walk-in available at all vaccination centers for age 18 years and above.
We do not store any user data. The certificate will be downloaded from CoWin portal in pdf form.
